solution_line_template: There are a total of {num_bags} x {oranges_per_bag} = <<{num_bags}*{oranges_per_bag}={total_oranges}>>{total_oranges} pieces of oranges in a truck.
A total of {rotten_oranges} + {oranges_for_juice} = <<{rotten_oranges}+{oranges_for_juice}={not_sold}>>{not_sold} pieces of oranges will not be sold.
Thus, {total_oranges} - {not_sold} = <<{total_oranges}-{not_sold}={oranges_sold}>>{oranges_sold} pieces of oranges will be sold.
